name: Spades Online Club - Card Game
description:
#1 ONLINE SPADES CARD GAME - LIVE VOICE CHAT

Play the best online multiplayer trick-taking card game with friends and make new friends from all around the world!

You can play Spades online with TOURNAMENTS, KNOCK-OUT and You can join the LEAGUE!

Spades Club is a FREE card game and Spades Club offers you different games within the app like SLOT MACHINE and HORSE RACE too. If you are looking for the most fun Spades game, this is it! Spades Club is not only a card game but also a great Social Network. Making new friends wouldn’t be easier than this. Just swipe right to MATCH with new people. You’ll feel yourself in the royale family plus VIP in Vegas! Don’t forget Spades are always trump. It ain’t a Poker, Solitaire, Bingo game. Spades is a trick-taking card game like Bid Whist, Hearts, Euchre & Canasta. Unlike those card games, Spades is played in partnership. Don’t forget Spades are always trump.

== SPADES CLUB FEATURES ==

- LIVE VOICE CHAT
You can talk to players during the game.

- DISCOVER SPADES PLAYER AROUND YOU
Check the players around you and match with them!

SLOT MACHINES
Let Las Vegas slots come to you, go on a wild ride of slot casino game fun!

HORSE RACE
Bet your favourite horse and win big.

CURIOUS ABOUT YOUR VIEWERS?
Check your viewers and become friends with them.
TOP CLASS LEADERBOARDS
Become the KING or QUEEN of spades!

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS
Add more friends and enjoy playing Spades with them.

FREE CHIP BONUSES
Free Chip Bonuses Hourly & Daily!

BLIND NIL & NIL BIDS
Play Spades with Nil and Blind Nil Options.

CREATE YOUR OWN TABLES
You can create tables and play Spades at it with the player only you invite.

CHALLENGE THE COMMUNITY
Challenge your friends or other players and show them who is the best

Have any suggestions? Contact the Joker team at support@joker.games
